title: Ensure leaderboard displays all public entries from all users

requirements.text: Verify that the Published feed page (frontend/src/pages/combine/Published.tsx) displays all public combine entries from all authenticated users, not just the current user's entries

quotes: How to make sure the leaderboard is public and includes everyone that makes an entry?

acceptanceCriteria: The Published feed shows entries from all users who have made their entries public
Entries are not filtered by the current user's identity
Guest mode entries are excluded from the public feed since they lack stable authentication

requirements.text: Verify that the backend listPublishedEntries function returns all public entries across all users without filtering by caller identity

quotes: How to make sure the leaderboard is public and includes everyone that makes an entry?

acceptanceCriteria: Backend returns all entries where isPublic is true
Results include athlete name and all performance data

requirements.text: Add sorting capability to the Published feed to display entries as a proper leaderboard, with options to sort by different metrics (e.g., fastest 40-yard dash, highest vertical jump, most bench press reps)

quotes: How to make sure the leaderboard is public

acceptanceCriteria: Users can select which metric to sort by from a dropdown or tabs
Entries are ordered with best performances at the top
Default sort order is by most recent entry date

constraints: Do not modify the useInternetIdentity hook or authentication logic
Maintain the existing CombineEntry type structure
nonGoals: Creating a new separate leaderboard page (enhance existing Published feed)
Adding filtering by position or combine date
Implementing real-time updates or live rankings
